PrivacyPage.introduction: Nexus is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
PrivacyPage.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email, and organization information during registration. We also collect usage information through cookies and similar technologies.
PrivacyPage.section2Content: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
PrivacyPage.section3Content: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in business operations, but only to the extent necessary to provide services. We require these providers to protect your information.
PrivacyPage.section4Content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of Internet transmission is completely secure.
PrivacyPage.section5Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your data or request data portability. Contact us to exercise these rights.
PrivacyPage.section6Content: For users in the European Union, we process personal data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). You have specific rights regarding your personal data under GDPR.
